dcterms:creator: W.-L. Zheng
B.-L. Lu
dcterms:description: The STJU Emotion EEG Dataset (SEED) contains 62-channel EEG recordings sampled at 1000Hz from 15 participants recorded from 3 sessions. Participants were shown 15 film clips designed to elicit negative, neutral, or positive emotions, facilitating the learning of embeddings and reducing complexity for the emotion classifier.
dcterms:title: STJU Emotion EEG Dataset (SEED)

dcterms:creator: S. Koelstra
et al.
dcterms:description: DEAP is a database for emotion analysis using physiological signals, which includes EEG data among other modalities. It is designed for the analysis of affective states.
dcterms:title: DEAP

dcterms:creator: S. Katsigiannis
N. Ramzan
dcterms:description: DREAMER is a database for emotion recognition through EEG and ECG signals from wireless low-cost off-the-shelf devices, aimed at facilitating emotion recognition research.
dcterms:title: DREAMER

dcterms:creator: J. A. Miranda-Correa
et al.
dcterms:description: Amigos is a dataset for affect, personality, and mood research on individuals and groups, providing a rich resource for studying emotional and personality traits.
dcterms:title: Amigos
